-- Reporte diario
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_citas,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN estado = 'COMPLETADA' THEN 1 END) as completadas,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN estado = 'CANCELADA' THEN 1 END) as canceladas,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN estado = 'NO_ASISTIO' THEN 1 END) as no_asistio,
  COALESCE(SUM(
    (SELECT SUM(precio) FROM servicios_citas sc WHERE sc.cita_id = citas.id)
  ), 0) as ingresos_total
FROM citas
WHERE DATE(fecha_hora) = CURRENT_DATE;

-- Top servicios del dÃ­a
SELECT s.nombre, COUNT(*) as cantidad
FROM servicios_citas sc
JOIN servicios s ON sc.servicio_id = s.id
JOIN citas c ON sc.cita_id = c.id
WHERE DATE(c.fecha_hora) = CURRENT_DATE
GROUP BY s.nombre
ORDER BY cantidad DESC
LIMIT 5;

-- Top barberos del dÃ­a
SELECT e.nombre, COUNT(*) as citas_atendidas
FROM citas c
JOIN empleados e ON c.barbero_id = e.id
WHERE DATE(c.fecha_hora) = CURRENT_DATE
  AND c.estado = 'COMPLETADA'
GROUP BY e.nombre
ORDER BY citas_atendidas DESC;

-- Reporte semanal (Ãºltima semana)
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_citas,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN estado = 'COMPLETADA' THEN 1 END) as completadas,
  COALESCE(SUM(
    (SELECT SUM(precio) FROM servicios_citas sc WHERE sc.cita_id = citas.id)
  ), 0) as ingresos_total
FROM citas
WHERE fecha_hora >= DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days')
  AND fecha_hora < DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_DATE);

-- Top 5 clientes de la semana
SELECT cl.nombre, COUNT(*) as visitas,
       COALESCE(SUM(
         (SELECT SUM(precio) FROM servicios_citas sc WHERE sc.cita_id = c.id)
       ), 0) as gastado
FROM citas c
JOIN clientes cl ON c.cliente_id = cl.id
WHERE c.fecha_hora >= DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days')
  AND c.fecha_hora < DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_DATE)
  AND c.estado = 'COMPLETADA'
GROUP BY cl.nombre
ORDER BY visitas DESC, gastado DESC
LIMIT 5;

-- Top servicios de la semana
SELECT s.nombre, COUNT(*) as cantidad,
       SUM(sc.precio) as ingresos
FROM servicios_citas sc
JOIN servicios s ON sc.servicio_id = s.id
JOIN citas c ON sc.cita_id = c.id
WHERE c.fecha_hora >= DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days')
  AND c.fecha_hora < DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_DATE)
GROUP BY s.nombre
ORDER BY cantidad DESC
LIMIT 5;
